title: List of Cultural Properties of Japan - paintings (Yamagata)
data: Shellfish-gathering at Shinagawa Gotenyama Distant View of Nori -gathering at Okuyama near Nihon Kaian-ji light colours on silk , by Andō Hiroshige 絹本淡彩 御殿山 品川汐干狩図 日本 海晏寺 奥山海苔取遠望図 安藤広重筆 kenpon tansai Gotenyama Shinagawa shiohi gari zu Nihon Kaianji Okuyama nori-tori enbō zu ( Andō Hiroshige hitsu )
90.4 centimetres ( 2 ft 11.6 in ) by 30.1 centimetres ( 11.9 in )

section_text: As of 2 November 2018 , seventy-seven properties have been designated at a prefectural level . [ 4 ] [ 16 ]
intro: This list is of the Cultural Properties of Japan designated in the category of paintings (絵画, kaiga) for the Prefecture of Yamagata.
